column4: have you recently cleaned the system, removing all dust from all cooling systems
and of course do a cold start with memtest allowing it to run for 2 runs or something
remove all plugs from the system as well and make sure all parts ( including the processor) are well seated, and apply a slight amount of pressure to reassure they are all well seated
the system is clean because I've just put it together :) but I'll try the memory test
